UnitDefinition.Name: Nondetect imputation method types
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted nondetect imputation method types. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: Replace by LOR/LOQ/LOD
Unit.Description: Non-quantifications are replaced by f * LOR or f * LOD or by LOD + f * (LOQ - LOD) where f is a constant.

Unit.Name: Impute from censored lognormal distribution
Unit.Description: Replace nondetect measurements by a random draw from the lower (left) tail of the censored lognormal distribution.
